name: MetaVPad
description: MetaVPad enables you to participate in the projects that will form the infrastructure and early pioneers of the Metaverse. You can think of the MVPad token as your key. By staking your tokens, you’ll unlock a tier and all of the perks it brings, including first access to token launches, generous staking rewards, and potential access to a first-of-its-kind Metaverse stakedrop — giving you a FREE allocation in the most exclusive projects at the best rates. The higher your tier, the better your access, and the closer you get to the heart of the Metaverse.
